input.sentences: the man posed before the camera on the day of his graduation .
the happy graduating class all took a photo together before the ceremony .
after the photo | the group walked in line to the auditorium .
the man happily accepted his degree .
after the ceremony was over | he proudly showed off the top of his cap .
output.sentences: My cousin posted this picture of me on graduation day.
We took this photo of us all happy we were graduating.
My dad walked over and took this photo of us waiting in the procession line.
I looked at my degree proudly after the ceremony.after graduating at the top of my class.
